Description:
Rise of the Triad is a remake of the first-person shooter Rise of the Triad: Dark War, released in 1995 year. The game features an improved 3D world, and is present as a single-player campaign and multiplayer. In Rise of the Triad you have to play the role of one of five members of the squad HUNT, each of which is unique and has its own style of play. Armed with an impressive arsenal, you go to destroy enemies throughout the 20 levels of the campaign, as well as be able to take part in a variety of multiplayer modes. In the game you will find a lot of secrets, special events, hidden locations and collectibles. The integrated support for Steamworks, you will have the opportunity to create their own levels, mods and share them with other users.
